name: Charlie II
description: Charlie II is a classic side-scrolling platform game. Run through levels, collect coins, diamonds and other power ups. Jump on top of enemies to defeat them. Dive into the water to find hidden areas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Pentium II or above Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL / DirectX 7.0 compatible DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 33 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM
